title: It’s Awesome To Be Me
description: In this school, much like your own, one boy is about to learn an important lesson about self-worth and esteem, with help from Brock Branigan P.I.
quote: Go for it! Show them how awesome you really are!
altHero: Brock Branigan P.I. giving a wink and thumbs up
alt1: dorky kid with his face resting on his hand
alt2: Brock speaks with the dorky kid
alt3: popular girl and guy are stunned
alt4: dorky kid’s obvious stunt double breakdancing
